summary: Implements a pipeline that cleans the Google Text Normalization dataset, builds class‑specific parallel corpora, runs GIZA++ to generate word alignments, extracts and merges those alignments, filters out problematic sentences, and outputs a labeled training corpus together with a replacement vocabulary for text‑normalization‑as‑tagging models.
business_intent: Enable creation of accurate text‑normalization tagging models by supplying high‑quality, aligned and filtered training data for each semiotic class, facilitating spoken‑form generation from written text.
